title: Town's last hope

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At any time, you may play rock paper scissors with a player that cannot win with you of the host's choosing. The player that loses, dies.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If there are two or fewer townies in any given game and more than 6 players remaining, any townie may invoke the ancient potato ritual to become this, and have a 40% chance to fail (this chance increases by 10% for every night that has passed.).

desc:
Post 5154
(Above alignments, is all of them at once)
